column1: I would love to see an option for online booking with real-time availability.
The website should have a clean and modern design with pastel colors.
Please add a feature to book multiple services in one go.
I prefer a mobile-friendly website with a simple navigation menu.
It would be great if the website could send booking reminders via SMS or email.
Can you add a loyalty program where customers earn points for each visit?
I’d like to see customer reviews and ratings for each salon.
Please include a feature to upload before-and-after photos of services.
The website should have a dark mode option for better visibility at night.
It would be helpful to see the price list for all services upfront.
Can you add a feature to book appointments for multiple people at once?
I’d like to see a blog section with tips on hair and skincare.
Please make sure the website loads quickly on mobile devices.
It would be great if the website could recommend services based on my preferences.
Can you add a feature to cancel or reschedule appointments online?
I’d like to see a map showing nearby salons with available slots.
Please include a feature to pay online using credit cards or digital wallets.
It would be helpful to see the estimated duration of each service.
Can you add a feature to save favorite salons or stylists?
I’d like to see a section for seasonal promotions and discounts.
The website should have a chatbot for instant customer support.
Please include a feature to book appointments for specific stylists.
It would be great if the website could show the availability of male and female stylists.
Can you add a feature to filter salons by services offered?
I’d like to see a section for gift cards or vouchers.
Please make sure the website is accessible for people with disabilities.
It would be helpful to see the qualifications and experience of stylists.
Can you add a feature to book appointments for kids’ haircuts?
I’d like to see a section for trending hairstyles and tutorials.
Please include a feature to book appointments for special occasions like weddings.
It would be great if the website could show customer testimonials.
Can you add a feature to book appointments for home services?
I’d like to see a section for eco-friendly salons and products.
Please include a feature to book appointments for group events.
It would be helpful to see the cancellation policy upfront.
Can you add a feature to book appointments for last-minute slots?
I’d like to see a section for virtual consultations with stylists.
Please include a feature to book appointments for pet grooming.
It would be great if the website could show the availability of parking spaces.
Can you add a feature to book appointments for senior citizens?
I’d like to see a section for DIY hair and beauty tips.
Please include a feature to book appointments for late-night slots.
It would be helpful to see the hygiene ratings of salons.
Can you add a feature to book appointments for international customers?
I’d like to see a section for seasonal hair and beauty trends.
Please include a feature to book appointments for corporate events.
It would be great if the website could show the availability of wheelchair access.
Can you add a feature to book appointments for same-day services?
I’d like to see a section for hair and beauty product recommendations.
Please include a feature to book appointments for trial sessions.
It would be helpful to see the availability of vegan or cruelty-free products.
Can you add a feature to book appointments for express services?
I’d like to see a section for customer loyalty rewards.
Please include a feature to book appointments for personalized consultations.
It would be great if the website could show the availability of private rooms.
Can you add a feature to book appointments for group discounts?
I’d like to see a section for hair and beauty tutorials.
Please include a feature to book appointments for virtual makeovers.
It would be helpful to see the availability of multilingual staff.
